description: Lists coverage details for your GuardDuty account. If you're a GuardDuty administrator, you can retrieve all resources associated with the active member accounts in your organization. Make sure the accounts have Runtime Monitoring enabled and GuardDuty agent running on their resources.

parameters.name: DetectorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the detector whose coverage details you want to retrieve. To find the detectorId in the current Region, see the Settings page in the GuardDuty console, or run the ListDetectors API.

parameters.name: FilterCriteria
parameters.description: Represents the criteria used to filter the coverage details. FilterCriterion (list) --- Represents a condition that when matched will be added to the response of the operation. (dict) --- Represents a condition that when matched will be added to the response of the operation. CriterionKey (string) --- An enum value representing possible filter fields. FilterCondition (dict) --- Contains information about the condition. Equals (list) --- Represents an equal condition that is applied to a single field while retrieving the coverage details. (string) --- NotEquals (list) --- Represents a not equal condition that is applied to a single field while retrieving the coverage details. (string) ---

nested_params.name: FilterCriterion
nested_params.description: Represents a condition that when matched will be added to the response of the operation.

nested_params.name: CriterionKey
nested_params.description: An enum value representing possible filter fields.

nested_params.name: Equals
nested_params.description: Represents an equal condition that is applied to a single field while retrieving the coverage details.

nested_params.name: NotEquals
nested_params.description: Represents a not equal condition that is applied to a single field while retrieving the coverage details.

parameters.name: SortCriteria
parameters.description: Represents the criteria used to sort the coverage details. AttributeName (string) --- Represents the field name used to sort the coverage details. OrderBy (string) --- The order in which the sorted findings are to be displayed.

nested_params.name: AttributeName
nested_params.description: Represents the field name used to sort the coverage details.

nested_params.name: OrderBy
nested_params.description: The order in which the sorted findings are to be displayed.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: A list of resources and their attributes providing cluster details.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the resource.

nested_items.name: DetectorId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the GuardDuty detector associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: ResourceDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the resource for which the coverage statistics are retrieved.

nested_items.name: EksClusterDetails
nested_items.description: EKS cluster details involved in the coverage statistics.

nested_items.name: ClusterName
nested_items.description: Name of the EKS cluster.

nested_items.name: CoveredNodes
nested_items.description: Represents the nodes within the EKS cluster that have a HEALTHY coverage status.

nested_items.name: CompatibleNodes
nested_items.description: Represents all the nodes within the EKS cluster in your account.

nested_items.name: AddonDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the installed EKS add-on.

nested_items.name: AddonVersion
nested_items.description: Version of the installed EKS add-on.

nested_items.name: AddonStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the installed EKS add-on.

nested_items.name: ManagementType
nested_items.description: Indicates how the Amazon EKS add-on GuardDuty agent is managed for this EKS cluster.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: EcsClusterDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon ECS cluster that is assessed for runtime coverage.

nested_items.name: ClusterName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon ECS cluster.

nested_items.name: FargateDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the Fargate details associated with the Amazon ECS cluster.

nested_items.name: Issues
nested_items.description: Runtime coverage issues identified for the resource running on Amazon Web Services Fargate.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ManagementType
nested_items.description: Indicates how the GuardDuty security agent is managed for this resource.
AUTO_MANAGED indicates that GuardDuty deploys and manages updates for this resource.
DISABLED indicates that the deployment of the GuardDuty security agent is disabled for this resource.

nested_items.name: ContainerInstanceDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon ECS container running on Amazon EC2 instance.

nested_items.name: CoveredContainerInstances
nested_items.description: Represents the nodes in the Amazon ECS cluster that has a HEALTHY coverage status.

nested_items.name: CompatibleContainerInstances
nested_items.description: Represents total number of nodes in the Amazon ECS cluster.

nested_items.name: Ec2InstanceDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon EC2 instance assessed for runtime coverage.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 instance ID.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the Amazon EC2 instance.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The cluster ARN of the Amazon ECS cluster running on the Amazon EC2 instance.

nested_items.name: AgentDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the installed security agent.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: Version of the installed GuardDuty security agent.

nested_items.name: ManagementType
nested_items.description: Indicates how the GuardDuty security agent is managed for this resource.
AUTO_MANAGED indicates that GuardDuty deploys and manages updates for this resource.
MANUAL indicates that you are responsible to deploy, update, and manage the GuardDuty security agent updates for this resource.

nested_items.name: CoverageStatus
nested_items.description: Represents the status of the EKS cluster coverage.

nested_items.name: Issue
nested_items.description: Represents the reason why a coverage status was UNHEALTHY for the EKS cluster.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the coverage details for the resource were last updated. This is in UTC format.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination parameter to be used on the next list operation to retrieve more items.
